mapper.insert: insert into task_members (task_id, user_id, task_role, join_by, status) values (#{taskId}, #{userId}, #{taskRole}, #{joinBy}, #{status})
mapper.update:
UPDATE task_members
task_role = #{taskRole},
status = #{status},
join_by = #{joinBy},
join_date = #{joinDate},
updated_time = #{updateTime}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from task_members where task_id = #{taskId} and status = 'ACTIVE'

select tm.*, u.username, u.real_name as realName, u.email, u.phone, u.avatar, u.department, u.role as userRole, u2.real_name as joinByName from task_members tm left join users u on tm.user_id = u.id left join users u2 on tm.join_by = u2.id
and tm.task_id = #{taskId}
and tm.status = 'ACTIVE'
and u.username like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and u.real_name like concat('%', #{realName}, '%')
and tm.task_role like concat('%', #{taskRole}, '%')
and u.department like concat('%', #{department}, '%')
order by tm.task_id desc
